duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist high-net-worth individuals and corporations in estate planning, charitable planning, business succession planning, and estate/trust administration in a domestic and cross-border capacity.
Work with partners from Biglaw to provide legal services.
No billable requirement, with most attorneys billing around 1600 hours.
Compensation package includes a base, bonus, and two-pronged originations.

education_certification.credential: JD and previous law firm experience required.
